# tag-card









## Demos









#### Basic card









```html




<tag-card></tag-card>




```









#### Card with accent colour









```html




<tag-card accent="access">




    <div style="padding: 1rem;">Content</div>




</tag-card>`




```









```html




<tag-card class="tall"></tag-card>




```
